card.name: Voldaren Bloodcaster
card.text: Flying Whenever Voldaren Bloodcaster or another nontoken creature you control dies, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you create a Blood token, if you control five or more Blood tokens, transform Voldaren Bloodcaster.

card.name: Bloodbat Summoner
card.text: Flying At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target Blood token you control becomes a 2/2 black Bat creature with flying and haste in addition to its other types.

card.name: Wandering Mind
card.text: Flying When Wandering Mind enters, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
